name: CupertinoActivityIndicator
desc: An iOS-style activity indicator that spins clockwise.

fields.name: animating
fields.desc: Whether the activity indicator is running its animation.

fields.name: progress
fields.desc: Determines the percentage of spinner ticks that will be shown. Typical usage would display all ticks, however, this allows for more fine-grained control such as during pull-to-refresh when the drag-down action shows one tick at a time as the user continues to drag down.

nodes.name: Basic Usage of CupertinoActivityIndicator
desc: 【animating】 : Whether the loading animation is active   【bool】
